1. The success rate for enhancing equipment a 4th time will be 100%.
2. The success rate for piercing the first hole in the equipment will be increased by 8%.

You can collect materials at home and the collecting speed will be increased by 5%." 編號="2514"/> <字串 文字="You can foster 4 pets in the Raise-a-Pet Room and they will train themselves.
You can put 2 monster eggs into your Monster Hatching Room.
The collecting and manufacturing skill level in the house will be enhanced by 5." 編號="2515"/> <字串 文字="/c#00F7FF[Basic House Attribute Introduction]/c*

1. House Size
The size of a house decides the max number of furniture players can use to decorate. The bigger the house is, the more furniture it can hold.
A small house can hold 35 pieces of furniture at most. A medium size house can hold 60 and a big house can hold 100.
2. Magic Index
The total magic index decides the house level and whether the house owner can use the house's special functions or not.
Each piece of furniture possesses a certain amount of Magic when it is used to decorate the house.
The total house magic is the sum of all the magic within the furniture.
The more rare the furniture is, the more magic it will possess.\If players use one or more kinds of furniture to decorate their houses, they will obtain 2% more house magic, up to 20% more at most.
Players will obtain even more basic magic if their houses can seize a place in the top 200 Popularity Rankings for the server.

3. Cleanliness Index
The house cleanliness will decrease as time passes. When it reaches 0, all house functions will be locked.
The house owner can clean the house with some cleaning items.
Only when the house owner enters his house can he clean it.
" 編號="2516"/> <字串 文字="The upper limit for cleanliness is 100. However, the house owner can use some items to enhance the upper limit so that the house can stay clean longer.

4. Popularity Index
The house owner will obtain certain popularity points when he votes for other house owners or others vote for him.
The popularity index is a measurement of the comments and votes from others and it decides the house owner's place on the ranking.
The house owner will obtain 2 popularity points each time a player votes for his house.
The house owner will obtain 1 popularity point for each vote cast for other player's houses.
Basic magic will be increased if players can seize a place in the top 200 on the server Popularity Rankings.
 The 1st place player's basic house magic will be increased by 50%.
The 2nd and 3rd place players' basic house magic will be increased by 40%.
The 4th-10th place players' basic house magic will be increased by 30%.
The 11th-50th place players' basic house magic will be increased by 25%.
The 51st-100th place players' basic house magic will be increased by 20%.
The 101st-200th place players' basic house magic will be increased by 15%.
5. Increase in Territory
After the totem battle ends, all guild members will enjoy certain magic increase if their guilds have won territory.
A higher level territory means guild members enjoy a +10% magic index and a lower one means +5% magic index.
During the Totem Battle, guilds won't obtain any increase in territory.

" 編號="2517"/> <字串 文字="/c#00F7FF[House Functions Introduction]/c*

1. Safe
 Each house has a Safe for players to use. There is no need to find a Banker anymore.
When the house reaches the appointed level, the house owner can open the guild safe directly from their house.
2. Voting
Each house owner has 5 popularity votes each day that they can use to vote for other player's houses.
Please talk to the house Maid if you would like to vote for a house.
Each popularity vote helps the target house obtain 2 popularity points.
Everytime a player votes for another player's house they will also receieve 1 popularity point.
The basic magic will be increased if players can seize a spot in the top 200 on the server Popularity Rankings.

3. House Bulletin
It contains house info and ball info.
The system will randomly choose 25 houses and announce them on the House Bulletin, which is refreshed each hour.
The system will list all the information on balls where the houses doesn't have a password.
" 編號="2518"/> <字串 文字="Press [GO] on the house bulletin, to visit the target house.

4. Rankings
Players can view all houses' popularity rankings in the four main cities and Palm Base.

5. Number of Visitors
The house owner can view the number of total visitors and messages left by those that voted for the house.

6. Maid Eilian
With the help of Maid Eilian, players can utilize many special house functions.

" 編號="2519"/> <字串 文字="/c#00F7FF[Special House Functions Introduction]/c*

1. Balls
 The house owner can hold a ball and invite other players to join the ball if he has the required items.
After the ball ends, the house owner must wait for a period of time so that he can hold another.
The higher the level of the house, the higher number of players that can be invited to the ball and the less time is required to wait for the next ball.
After the ball ends, the house owner will obtain a corresponding amount of Exp according to the number of players attending. The more players that attend, means the house owner will get more Exp.
After the ball ends, both the house owner and all participants will randomly obtain a Ball Candy with special magical effects. They will obtain different effects after they use the candy.

2. Manufacture
Each house has a Production Pet's Room
When the house reaches the appointed level, the house owner can collect materials, manufacturing machines or even use Suft's Mailbox.
The collecting speed can be enhanced when the house reaches the appointed level.

3. Raising Pets
There is a Raise-a-Pet Room for [Pet Eggs] in the Production Pet's Room.
When the house meets the requirements, the house owner can put a pet egg into the room and then the pet will train itself.
" 編號="2520"/> <字串 文字="If players use an Exp Diamond on their pets, the exp will be deposited in the diamond while it's being raised.
The higher the level of the house, the more pets can be raised.

4. Fighting Monster's Room
Each house has a Fighting Monster's Room and a Monster Hatching Machine for [Monster Eggs].
Put a [Monster Egg] inside the room and a monster will be born after a period of time.
The higher the level of the house, the more monster eggs can be put inside.
Players who team up with a house owner can enter the Fighting Monster's Room when the owner is home. However, no monster will be born if the house owner is out.

5. Mercenary System
The house owner can claim a [Mercenary Wand] from the maid and then summon mercenaries without summoning limits for the next hour. However, the Mercenary Wand requires 3 minutes to cool down.
The higher the level of the house, the stronger the mercenary the house owner can summon.
6. Lucky Notice
The house owner can claim a Lucky Notice from the Maid to enhance or pierce their equipment or even use a Lucky Pestle.
The effect is only available within the effective time." 編號="2521"/> <字串 文字="Furniture" 編號="2522"/> <字串 文字="/c#EEFF33>500/c*" 編號="2523"/> <字串 文字="/c#EEFF33The %d/c*" 編號="2524"/> <字串 文字="Today" 編號="2525"/> <字串 文字="Total" 編號="2526"/> <字串 文字="Visitors" 編號="2527"/> <字串 文字="The name must be English letters or numbers." 編號="2528"/> <字串 文字="The pet's satiation degree is 0, so it can't obtain any exp." 編號="2529"/> <字串 文字="更改語言後，請重新開啟遊戲才會有效果" 編號="2530"/> <字串 文字="Can't change the House Style now because the house is being viewed by others." 編號="2531"/> <字串 文字="Can't use this item to change the House Style." 編號="2532"/> <字串 文字="The Furniture Hammer can't be used on this item." 編號="2533"/> <字串 文字="The Furniture Hammer is not a high enough level." 編號="2534"/> <字串 文字="House Style: /c#00ff00%s/c*" 編號="2535"/> <字串 文字="You can't restore the house's appearance after you've changed it. Your Quest Log can't hold any more quests now. Delete some quests first." 編號="2601"/> <字串 文字="/c#00F7FF【カードファイルの説明】/c*
 1.アイテムバッグ内のカードを○ボタンで決定し、ファイルに貼り付けます。
 既に貼り付けたことのあるカードは貼り付けることが出来ません。
 2.【/c#EEFF33Alt+C/c*】で、カードファイルが開きます。
 3.ファイルは/c#EEFF33セット/c* /c#EEFF33リスト/c*に分かれます。/c#EEFF33セット/c*はセットが表示され、カー
 ドセットと奨励を確認するのに便利です。/c#EEFF33リスト/c*は全てのカードが表示さ
 れます。
 4.ファイルのリストの下に/c#EEFF33カードを取得するヒント/c*と/c#EEFF33セットの説明がありま
 す/c*。/c#00F7FF
【カードウインドーの説明】/c*（右の図を参照して下さい）
 1./c#00F7FFカード番号/c*：全てのカードには専属番号が振られており、検索に便利です
 。
 2./c#00F7FFカード名称/c*：テーマに対応する名称。
" 編號="2602"/> <字串 文字="3./c#00F7FF星レベル/c*：星レベルでカードのレベルを分けます。希少度と取得難易度と
 なります。/c#EEFF33星レベルの色/c*は/c#EEFF33白/c*、/c#EEFF33青/c*そして/c#EEFF33金/c*三色あります。
 4./c#00F7FFカードテーマ図/c*：テーマ図はカード名称に対応します。
 5./c#00F7FFカードの色/c*：カードは全部で4ジャンルに分かれます。
 /c#EEFF33一般、モンスター/c*→/c#EEFF33赤/c*、/c#EEFF33特殊モンスター/c*→/c#EEFF33黒/c*、
 /c#EEFF33キャラクターとステージ/c*→/c#EEFF33緑/c*、/c#EEFF33装備とアイテム/c*→/c#EEFF33白/c*。
 6./c#00F7FFカードの説明/c*：テーマに関しての簡単な説明です。/c#00F7FF
【カードセットウインドーの説明】/c*
 1.奨励品：セットを集めれば奨励品を獲得できます。/c#EEFF33選択式/c*賞品の中から一
 つ選ぶ方式と/c#EEFF33奨励/c*として表示される賞品を受け取る方式があります。
 2.交換ボタン：セットのカードを全て集めて、交換ボタンを押すと奨励を獲
 得出来ます。獲得方法が選択式の場合、欲しい奨励を選んでください。

(1) Equipment can be fused
 1. Main: pet
 # Main item level requirement:
 Level 80+
 # Assistant item level requirement:
 Level 60+ 
 # A Fusion Agent is required to
 complete the fusion process
 # The Random item will affect the
 results of the fusion process
 # Only the Main item(s) will remain
 after the fusion process is
 complete 
 # If a Transformer Potion is used
 during the fusion process, it
 will generate a new pet
 # Fusion will sometimes fail
 causing the pet to disappear 

 2. Main item: weapons, armor, Ride
 and Robot
 # Assistant item must be the same
 kind of item as the Main and the
 level gap must be no more than 10
 # A Fusion Agent is a necessary
 part of the fusion process
 # The Random item will affect the
 result
 of the fusion process
 # Only the Main item will remain
 after the fusion process is
 complete
 # The fusion process will not
 always be successful. If it fails
 the Main item will disappear.

" 編號="2783"/> <字串 文字=" 3. Main: Consuming item
 # The Main item must be equipment
 which can be stacked because
 one complete fusion requires
 10 pieces of equipment.
 # The Assistant item must also be
 the same type of equipment so
 10 pieces can be stacked as well.
 # The Random item is not necessary,
 but can be added to affect the
 outcome of the fusion process,
 for better or worse. 
 # After fusion is complete there
 will be one new item. 

(2) Success rate
 1. Pet
 # The [Main Item Quality Level],
 [Level of the Main Item],
 and [Additional Fusion Agent]
 will all affect the success rate
 of the fusion process. 
 2. Weapons, armor, Ride and Robot
 # The success rate for these will
 primarily be affected by the
 [Additional Fusion Agent]
 3. Consuming item
 # The success rate is 100%

(3) Fusion result
 1. Common pet fusion
 (use a common Fusion Agent) 
 # The additional attributes of the
 Assistant-pet will add to
 the Main-pet proportionally
 # Different attributes will have
 different additional attribute
 proportions.

" 編號="2784"/> <字串 文字=" # Additional attributes will be
 affected by the [Assistant-pet],
 [Random Item], [Success rate]
 and [Additional Fusion Agent].
 2. Pet transformer fusion (using a
 Transformer potion)
 # After fusion, the level of the
 Main-pet will be enhanced and
 the additional attributes will be
 transferred to the new pet,
 while the Assistant-pet's ability
 or additional abilities will not
 be preserved. 
 # The result of the fusion process
 will be primarily affected by the
 [Random Item] and the
 [Success rate]
 3. Weapons, armor, Ride and Robot
 # One additional attribute from the
 Assistant equipment will be
 added to the Main equipment
 proportionally
 # The additional attributes will be
 affected by the [Assistant Item],
 [Random Item], [Success rate],
 and the [Additional Fusion Agent]
 4. Consuming item
 # The results of the fusion process
 will be primarily affected by the
 [Main Item], [Assistant Item],
 and the [Success rate].

(4) Quality Level limitation of Pet
 fusion
 1. If one item's level exceeds the
 average level of the 3 items
 (Main, Assistant, Random) by more
 than 1, the fusion process will
 not produce any additional
 attributes.
 2. A pet must have 5 or more
 attributes meet the requirements
 to increase the pets star level.

" 編號="2785"/> <字串 文字="Pet Fusion failed." 編號="2786"/> <字串 文字="Pets with full HP can't be caught." 編號="2787"/> <字串 文字="Dead players can't contribute materials." 編號="2788"/> <字串 文字="Not enough equipment to begin the fusion process." 編號="2789"/> <字串 文字="你使用了柏青哥每日贈送功能，小鋼珠增加到%s顆。" 編號="2790"/> <字串 文字="你的小鋼珠超過%s顆，不需要使用贈送功能。" 編號="2791"/> <字串 文字="功能無效，你今天已經使用過贈送功能。" 編號="2792"/> <字串 文字="확성기 - 자유롭던 젊은 날을 청산하고 사랑하는 %s 와 행복한 가정을 만들려 하오니, 저희 결혼식에 참석하시어 많은 축복을 바랍니다." 編號="2793"/> <字串 文字="調強發射力道：在旋鈕上按下R1。

◎Using a Manufacturing Machine in the Raise-a-Pet Room will increase your chance of obtaining a super product by 1.6 times. " 編號="2893"/> <字串 文字="◎You can foster 5 pets in the Raise-a-Pet Room and they will train among themselves.
◎You may acquire 1 Enhanced Luck Notice: Effect III from Maid Eilian once per day (Effect lasts 3mins):

 2. The success rate for enhancing equipment a 5th time will be 90% 
 3. The success rate for piercing the first hole in a piece of equipment will be increased by 12% . 
 4. For players using a Lucky Hammer, they will have a 30% chance to add an additional attribute when enhancing gear..

All level 60 or above little angels can participat,this activity will separate the little angels into four different"Slarm Baby"farms based on their factions,Within 30 Minutes,through placing"Boom Slarm"in the opponents' farm will cause explosion damage to the opponent's Slarm Baby,the faction with the lowest damage on their Slarm baby when time ends will be the winner. Happy and nervous Faction Showdown,is waiting for you to challenge！ /c$2 The winning faction will receive"Faction Showdown Winning Certificate",using this proof you can claim the reward at the NPC"Daily Party Reward Clerk". The remaining produce will be left for the planters!" 編號="3163"/> <字串 文字="Angelic Farmer's Guild Instructions:
/c$2 [Conditions] /c* You may access the Guild farm options when you achieve Guild level /c$3"Lvl. 6"/c* or higher.
/c$2 [Planting] /c* 1. There are many ways to acquire your /c$3seeding tool/c* for farming. 2. After entering the farm, click on any plot of land. Your mouse icon will take on a dynamic form. 3. Open your backpack and right-click on your seeding tool. Your mouse icon will change to a dynamic "farming tool". 4. Left-click on an empty plot of land to begin planting. You will lose 1 seed. The plot will be labeled under your name. 5. You are only given 1 plot of farmland for planting. Seeds may only be planted after Harvesting your previous produce, or after the produce has withered and vanished. 6. Seeds sown grows over time. 7. The growth timeline of the produce is set at /c$3"Maturity or growing" stage/c*and/c$3"Withering"/c* stage: (a)Maturity/growing: It takes time for a seed to grow into produce. Once ripened, the produce can be harvested. (b)Withering: Compared to the ripening stage, a seed takes 3 times that amount of time to grow. The timer will commence once the seed is planted. Once a produce hits the withering period, the produce is labeled under "withered". 8. /c$3right-clicking/c*on a planted plot lets you choose from 3 actions; /c$3"Watering", "Fertilizing" and "Harvesting"./c*
" 編號="3164"/> <字串 文字=" /c$2 [Watering] /c* 1. Before the ripening process, your produce is open to all of your farmer's guild members to /c$3[Water ]/c*, each member of your farmer's guild may do so /c$3daily/c*; this action is capped at /c$3[5 times]/c* per produce. Watering can only be performed on a single produce at any given instance and its cap refreshes at 0:00hrs the next day. 2. Each time you perform the [Watering] action, you will be rewarded with /c$3[EXP]/c*. 3. Each produce has a cap on the number of times you can water. Once you've reach the cap, move on to another produce or plot to water.
/c$2 [Fertilizers] /c* 1. Before the ripening process, your produce is open to all of your farmer's guild members to /c$3[Fertilizer ]/c*, each member of your farmer's guild may do so /c$3daily/c*this action is capped at /c$3[5 times]/c* per produce. Watering can only be performed on a single produce at any given instance and its cap refreshes at 0:00hrs the next day. 2. Each time you perform the [Fertilizer] action, you will be rewarded with /c$3[Skill EXP] /c*. 3. Each produce has a cap on the number of times you can fertilize. Once you've reach the cap, try fertilizing another produce or plot. " 編號="3165"/> <字串 文字=" /c$2 [Harvesting] /c* 1. Once a produce has ripened, we'll move on to /c$3[Harvesting]/c*, every member of your farmer's guild can harvest the produce, with a /c$3daily/c* limit of /c$3[ 5 times]/c*Harvesting. Havesting can only be done on a single produce at any given time. 2. There are generally two types of harvesting;/c$3[Normal Harvesting]/c*, which is open to all members of your farmer's guild, and /c$3[Secured Harvesting]/c*, which is specifically for the sower. 3. Every member of your farmer's guild may take part in Normal Harvesting. Every Harvesting action that you make yields some produce and adds 1 action to the cap. Each plot can only be/c$3[Normal Harvested)]/c* once. 4. If you're the sower and your produce is ready for harvesting, the system will capture the action as [Secured Harvesting](even if it's a/c$3Normal Harvesting/c* action), and the produce will be captured as secured produce. After this, all harvesting actions will yield just one produce, and use up 1 [Normal Harvesting] action. 5. Harvesting rewards will be based on the amount of Water (watering) and Fertilizer (fertilizing) on the produce. You will receive/c$3[EXP and Skill EXP]/c*, plus a /c$3[produce]/c*. 6. Watering and Fertilizing doesn't affect the quality of the produce. You may choose to omit the Watering and Fertilizing process throughout the entire planting process. " 編號="3166"/> <字串 文字=" /c$2 [Withering] /c* 1. Once a produce reaches the /c$3[Withered]/c* stage, you will not be able to harvest it. In the withered stage, the plot of land becomes 'free' property. A withered produce has a lifespan of around/c$330mins./c*. Once withered, the produce vanishes, and the land returns to its original, empty state. 2. Once the/c$3[Normal Harvesting]and[Secure Harvesting]/c*, reaches it's maximum cap, the produce will be labeled under [Withering]. 3. Planting seeds on your withered produce during the 'Withering' stage will count as /c$3a/c* 'Fertilizing' effect.
/c$2 [Producer's guide to Produces] (Farming-mouseover displays)/c* 1. Name of Produce: Shows you the name of what you're growing. 2. Landowner's name: Shows you who owns this plot of land. 3. Maturity stage: Shows how much time is left before Harvesting 4. Withering Stage: Shows you how much time is left before your produce withers. 5. Fertilizing: Displays how much fertilizer has been added to the produce, as well as it's max. cap. 6. Watering: Displays how much water has been added to the produce, as well as it's max. cap 7. Normal Harvesting: Shows how much has been harvested, as well as it's max. cap. 8. Secured Harvesting: Displays the secured harvesting and has it been secured harvest previously. 9. Produce: All about what you're planting and the product that you will be getting when it's done. 10. Item Effect: Your produce's special buff or effect. " 編號="3167"/> <字串 文字=" /c$2 [Others] /c* 1. [Locust]： (1) There's a small chance that hungry locust will pop by your farm and devour your produce! It happens /c$3 Every night at these times: 19:00, 20:00, 21:00, 22:00/c*. (2) Locust attack will be announce over the Guild channel. (3) During an attack, the Locust will appear as 'pests' on the farm. The /c$3[Farm Locust]/c* can be destroyed in one hit. (4) If all the pests are not exterminated within /c$315mins./c* of its spawning, the produce will wither /c$35% faster/c*. A produce that's already in the Withered stage will not be affected. (5)The Locust will leave automatically 15 minutes after it spawns. (6)The Locust cannot be targetted by auto-attacking, such as /c$3[Angel Guard Elf]/c*. 2. Look out for more exciting tools and functions to make farming fun and easy!" 編號="3168"/> <字串 文字="You can't enter the Farm on this map! (二) 融合 1. 融合是利用分解及能量晶化而來的屬性晶能，轉換成實際加上裝扮的屬性綠字。 2. 每件裝扮均有可融合的上限值，未達上限值的裝扮可重覆進行融合，若已達到上限值的裝扮將無法再進行融合。 3. 將要融合的裝扮放進融合頁面的欄位。 4. 從屬性晶能列表勾選想要的屬性，並可使用『－』或『＋』對該屬性數值進行增減。 5. 按下『融合』將扣除已選取屬性的晶能值，並在裝扮加上此次融合轉換後的實際屬性綠字。 " 編號="3274"/> <字串 文字="Already reached enhanced limit." 編號="3275"/> <字串 文字="Hahaha! Pet Amplify Hammer: %d" 編號="3426"/> <字串 文字="[Introduction to Pet Amplify] 1. The hotkey [Ctrl+P] opens the Pet Amplify page. 2. You can choose to unlock Amplify Slots in the list on the right when you have collected enough Amplify Hammers (the number of Amplify Hammers required increases as the number of unlocked slots increases). 3. You can put any pet in the Amplify Slot and the inserted pet can be changed at any time. 4. The player's attributes are boosted based on the green attribute bonuses of the Amplified pet. 5. Stop Displaying Prompts: select this option to turn off all confirmation windows in the Amplify interface. 6. The bonus attribute displayed is the current bonus, which cannot exceed the current max value (the total bonus of all Slots for any one attribute cannot exceed this max). 7. Change All: Use 1 Re-Amplify Hammer to change the attribute and value, with random results. 8. Change Attribute: Use 1 Re-Amplify Attribute Hammer to change the attribute to a random one (Max HP, Max MP, Attack, Defense, Spell Attack, Spell Defense, Accuracy or Agility). 9. Change Value: Use 1 Re-Amplify Value Hammer to change the enhancement percentage to a random value between 10% and 50%. [Intro to Special Bonuses] 1. Requirement: Shows attribute and number of inlaid slots required. 2. Additional Bonuses: Extra attribute bonuses that your character gains when the requirements are met." 編號="3427"/> <字串 文字="Amount you have saved for this repair:" 編號="3428"/> <字串 文字="Number of uses:" 編號="3429"/> <字串 文字="10%-50%" 編號="3430"/> <字串 文字="Changed to:" 編號="3431"/> <字串 文字="Unable to enhance pet that is currently Amplified and/or equipped" 編號="3432"/> <字串 文字="Please remove pet from Amplify Slot and/or un-equip it first." 編號="3433"/> <字串 文字="This kingdom is mine! Obtained from Divination or [/c$9Exchange/c*]. Equip Star Signs in the Star Matrix to boost your character's attributes. 02. /c$2Olympian Star Signs:/c* Highest Grade Star Signs. Obtained from [/c$9Exchange/c*] only. Equip in the Star Matrix to boost your character's attributes. 03. /c$2Starforce:/c* Obtained by Converting Star Signs. Use to increase Star Sign Level. 04. /c$2Stardust:/c* Chance to obtain from Divination. Can be used to exchange for Perfect Star Signs in the [/c$9Exchange/c*] tab.
/c$2[How it Works]/c* 01. Tap a [/c$9Roman numeral button/c*] in the [/c$9Divination/c*] tab to perform a Divination. Hover over a [/c$9Roman numeral button/c*] to check the Divination cost (in Coins). Tap the button to draw a random Star Sign. Contents will vary according to the Divination cost. Alternatively, you may tap [/c$9Auto Divine/c*] for the system to draw automatically instead of doing it manually. 02. Star Signs obtained from Divination will be shown in the /c$9Divination Outcome/c*. Place the Star Signs that you wish to keep in the /c$9Star Sign Storage/c*. 03. Tap [/c$9Auto Convert/c*] to convert all remaining Star Signs in the /c$9Divination Outcome/c* into Starforce, which can be used to increase Star Sign Level. 04. Tap the [/c$9Star Matrix/c*] tab to equip the Star Signs that you have in the /c$9Star Sign Storage/c*. Various types of Star Signs can be equipped in the Star Matrix, but /c$9only one of each type can be equipped at the same time/c*. 05. Exchange for Perfect Star Signs and Olympian Star Signs in the [/c$9Exchange/c*] tab. You can find the Star Signs in your /c$9Star Sign Storage/c* after exchanging." 編號="3643"/> <字串 文字="該道具非此伺服器販售，故無法取出物品" 編號="3644"/> <字串 文字="/c$9僅能於下列伺服器取出：/c*" 編號="3645"/> <字串 文字="該道具無法於此伺服器取出" 編號="3646"/> <字串 文字="The monster level is too high to cast Shining Charm" 編號="3647"/> <字串 文字="
/c$2[Tab Info]/c* 01. /c$2[Star Matrix]/c* Equip and Level Up Star Signs here. More slots will be unlocked as your character's level increases. You may /c$9Increase Star Sign Level/c* on the bottom right of the [/c$9Star Matrix/c*] page when you have converted enough Starforce in the [/c$9Divination/c*] tab,. 02. /c$2[Divination]/c* Acquire Star Signs and convert Starforce here. Hover over a [/c$9Roman numeral button/c*] to check the Divination cost (in Coins). Tap to draw a random Star Sign with a chance to unlock the next [/c$9Roman numeral button/c*]. Alternatively, you may tap [/c$9Auto Divine/c*] for the system to draw automatically instead of doing it manually. Content will vary according to the Divination cost. In addition to drawing Star Signs, you can play /c$9Star Bingo/c* in the Divination process. Get rewards from /c$9Star Bingo/c* based on the number of lines you match. Place the Star Signs that you wish to keep in the /c$9Star Sign Storage/c*. Tap [/c$9Auto Convert/c*] to convert all remaining Star Signs in the /c$9Divination Outcome/c* into Starforce. 03. /c$2[Exchange]/c* Exchange for Perfect Star Signs and Olympian Star Signs here. Collect Stardust or the required Star Signs to exchange for Perfect Star Signs and Olympian Star Signs." 編號="3648"/> <字串 文字="You can't change channels as this map is channel-restricted." 編號="3649"/> <字串 文字="Channel-" 編號="3650"/> <字串 文字="Current Channel:" 編號="3651"/> <字串 文字="The map server has not been activated. 編號="3698"/> <字串 文字="眼明手快Ⅱ" 編號="3699"/> <字串 文字="肥滋滋快樂村Ⅱ" 編號="3700"/> <字串 文字="歡迎來到每日派對「肥滋滋快樂村Ⅱ」！ 凡170級以上的小天使皆可報名參加。在肥滋滋快樂村裡，有取之不盡的全等級物產，開採時間非常短，讓生產系小天使事半功倍！而遊戲中代表性的區域小王也會在這裡出現，並且以極快的速度重生，讓戰鬥系小天使能盡情熱血戰鬥。 無論是生產系或戰鬥系小天使，這裡都是快樂的天堂！" 編號="3701"/> <字串 文字="勢力殲滅戰Ⅳ" 編號="3702"/> <字串 文字="歡迎來到每日派對「勢力殲滅戰Ⅳ」！ 凡401級以上或/c$3超越巔峰/c*的小天使皆可報名參加，本活動將會把參賽者分為兩大勢力，一同相互進行PK競賽。30分鐘內，只要能優於對方勢力消滅較多的敵勢力小兵，就可獲得優勝，請大家整裝待發，一同前進這精采刺激的勢力戰場吧！ /c$2優勝的一方可以獲得「勢力殲滅戰領獎證明」，依此證明可向NPC「每日派對獎賞專員」領取優勝獎賞。若結果為平手，則雙方皆無獎賞。/c*" 編號="3703"/> <字串 文字="天使打通關Ⅳ" 編號="3704"/> <字串 文字="歡迎來到每日派對「天使打通關Ⅳ」！ 凡401級以上或/c$3超越巔峰/c*的小天使皆可報名參加。本活動的終極目標，在於打敗所有把守城堡關卡的強力魔頭們，每打倒一名魔頭，被封鎖的通路就會開啟，只有在活動結束前闖過四道門檻，才能挑戰最後的魔王！只要能打敗最後魔王，城堡內就會出現許多價值珍貴的寶箱讓所有小天使們開啟，請大家攜手合作、勇闖難關吧！" 編號="3705"/> <字串 文字="詐欺世界Ⅳ" 編號="3706"/> <字串 文字="歡迎來到每日派對「詐欺世界Ⅳ」！ 凡401級以上或/c$3超越巔峰/c*的小天使皆可報名參加。本活動是一個不擇手段競逐寶物的詐欺遊戲，過程中只有五名坐擁無數寶箱的詐欺高手來挑戰所有小天使，只要打敗他們就能讓場地上出現大量的寶箱。然而在這個無情的世界中，所有的小天使們一旦入場後就會遭受詛咒，而能夠互相攻擊對方！你的敵人，究竟是詐欺之王，還是你所熟悉的好友？彼此的友誼，將在詐欺世界中受到最嚴苛的考驗！" 編號="3707"/> <字串 文字="幸福守護Ⅳ" 編號="3708"/> <字串 文字="歡迎來到每日派對「幸福守護Ⅳ」！ 凡401級以上或/c$3超越巔峰/c*的小天使皆可報名參加。女神之塔一直是帶給小天使們幸福及力量的象徵，怪物大軍因此極力的想毀壞它。 活動開始，怪物大軍會攻破防禦柵欄，往戰場中間移動，攻擊女神之塔，因此所有小天使們必須在30分鐘內，一同守護遭受怪物大軍攻擊的女神之塔。 只要在活動時間內守住女神之塔不被擊破/c$2小天使們就可以獲得「幸福守護領獎證明」，依此證明可向NPC「每日派對獎賞專員」領取優勝獎賞。若女神之塔被怪物大軍毀滅，則無法獲得獎賞。/c*" 編號="3709"/> <字串 文字="歡迎來到每日派對「眼明手快Ⅱ」！ 本活動有數不盡的寶箱無條件大放送，只要打敗寶箱就能獲得獎賞。 需要特別注意的是，對寶箱只能進行普通攻擊，任何法術或招式都是無效的！寶箱會隨機出現在活動場地裡，只有手腳最快的小天使，才能搶到最多寶物滿載而歸！" 編號="3710"/> <字串 文字="發話過於頻繁！！訊息無法發送。" 編號="3711"/>
